thread.title: Innovative Training Program Launches Partnership with Advocis
thread.title_full: Innovative Training Program Launches Partnership with Advocis

author: Natalie Ho
title: Innovative Training Program Launches Partnership with Advocis
text:
LOGiQ³, an expert consulting and outsourcing service provider for the life insurance, reinsurance and financial services industry is excited to announce a new partnership with Advocis, The Financial Advisors Association of Canada, to offer LOGiQ³’s innovative Underwriting Training Program directly to Advocis members. Through this training program comprised of 27 online modules , life insurance advisors will be able to better serve their clients by being equipped with knowledge and understanding of impairments and risk factors associated with mortality or morbidity, know how to decrease the delays of the underwriting process and increase the speed to policy issues. Graduates of this program leave with the practical communication skills as well as completion of annual CE requirements.
Earlier this year, Advocis and LOGiQ³ announced their partnership in the deposit broker education space , which Advocis is the sole distributor of the A3 solution for the Deposit Broker Distribution Channel, yet another innovative system developed by LOGiQ³ dedicated to improving deposit broker compliance standards and reducing risk.
Carmela Tedesco, VP of Underwriting and Claims at LOGiQ³ comments, “We are excited to once again be contributing to the advancement of industry standards. Our objectives are to bring accessibility, efficiency and a higher standard to the tools and information available to Advisors and Underwriters alike. Our partnerships with Advocis have proven to be beneficial and we are pleased to offer our innovative tool to their members.”
Brenda Molnar, Director of Education at Advocis adds, “We’re proud to partner with Logiq³ on this initiative. Our partnership is a reflection of our core beliefs and dedication to providing financial advisors with the strong educational foundation needed to succeed in the business. These accredited e-learning modules, which are available through the Advocis Learning Centre, give advisors the advantage of knowing how an underwriter thinks and delivers the specific information required for risk selection.”
To celebrate the launch of this partnership, Advocis members who wish to sign up for underwriting training are offered an additional 20% off promotion. To take advantage of this promotion, please visit http://www.advocis.ca/ALC/Logiq3-modules.aspx .
